attributes.action: urgently appoint Brian Blessed as the publics choice for Speaker of the House of Commons!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are living in inspirational times! 

The great British public has witnessed the undoing en masse of our MP'S using the Great British public's taxes as furnishings for their flipped homes. 

The Great British Public is also witnessing respected public figures  emerging to save the reputation of democracy by taking up their right to stand for parliament to create a more just and fairer brand of politics to the Great British Public! 

Speaker vacancy!

There will be a vote for Speaker of The House in June. We the Great British Public are demanding that a Respected and Trusted public figure be given the right to take up the position of Speaker of
 the House by means of the Great British Public vote. This will ensure a Trusted medium for Democracy which needs to be Installed finally! 

We,THE GREAT BRITISH PUBLIC,demand via this petition that BRIAN BLESSED be allowed to stand in the voting process for Speaker of the House! 

He simply is The Great British Publics' natural choice!

ORDER! ORDER! OOOOORRRRRRDDDDDEEEEEEEEEEEERRRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!!@**??/!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
